answers.answer: Hello,Such penile tingling can be due to dermatitis,infections like gonorrhea and Chlamydia,kidney stones,diabetes,bacterial urethritis,prostatitis or nerve irritation or compression.A complete profile of investigation including urine examination,prostatic fluid examination,blood sugar levels,MR neurography and ultrasound lower abdomen and genitalia may be required. I sincerely suggest you to consult  a urologist for this.Hope it helps.Take care and regards.

question: dear urologist  about six months ago i had terible pain in botox near sacral spine as well as rectal and scrotal mostly scrotal pain and abnormal sensations in genatals after prolonged siting the pain lasted about a month then went away but when the pain whent away so did the feeling in genitals i haven,t had feeling down there for about 5 months now im starting to feel a slight tingling and cold sensations i have hypothyroidism treated of course and ive had low feritin in the past i don,t have diebietes  what ever the cause it only efects the  sensory nerves i still get erections in my sleep  and sex drive is good what could be causeing this and will the feeling come back at all
title: sever lack of feeling with tingling in genitals
